text:
Hey everyone!
I happened to come across this Julia Project idea: Geostatistical clustering methods for GeoStats.jl and I'd love to be a part of this. Apart from reading the papers mentioned, how do I get started?

Slack is a black hole where all the conversation is erased

text: <@U01M2M35BFW> please reach out on Zulip if you want to discuss this project idea further. I am going offline for today but will check it over the weekend, probably Sunday.
